pages.title: welcome lovife's Wiki Site
pages.text: 个人 Wiki 站点 want to be a active learner, but failed, never stop trying. 收集学习材料 手写笔记 电子笔记系统 & Wiki & Blog my org/ |--agenda: org-agenda file |--inbox: mixed org-mode note |--note: first assimilate | |--notebook1 | | |--note1.org | | |--note1.publish | | | ... | | |--note.org | | `--note.publish | | ... | `--notebook |--wiki: make it my own |--anki: make anki card for anything important or easy to forget `--blog: for share what is worth sharing 笔记 在于 理解和分类整理 Wiki 在于 积累和快速索引 Blog 在于 精 Render by Emacs 25.3.1 (Org mode 8.2.10)
